# x

**Instance Property**

The acceleration measurement along the x-axis, in multiples of earth’s gravity.

## Declaration

```swift
var x: Double
```

## Getting Acceleration Values

- **y**: The acceleration measurement along the y-axis, in multiples of earth’s gravity.
- **z**: The acceleration measurement along the z-axis, in multiples of earth’s gravity.
